detail.name: Albus Dumbledore
detail.text: If you have at least 4 Lessons in play, your Spell cards with a printed Power cost of 6 or more need 2 less Power to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)
detail.flavorText: '(Order of Merlin, First Class, Grand Sorc., Chf. Warlock, Supreme Mugwump, International Confed. of Wizards)' — Hogwarts letterhead

detail.name: Albus Dumbledore
detail.text: Si vous au moins 4 Cours en jeu, vos cartes Sort ayant un coût de Pouvior imprimé de 6 au minimum coûtent 2 Pouvoirs de moins à jouer. (Vous avex toujours besoin d'au moins 1 Pouvoir qui corresponde.)
detail.flavorText: 'Commandeur du Grand-Ordre de Merlin, Docteur ès Sorcellerie, Enchanteur-en-chef, Manitou suprême de la Confédération internationale des Mages et Sorciers.' - En-tête de Poudlard.

detail.name: Argus Filch
detail.text: You may use an Action to discard an Adventure from play (yours or your opponent's). (You don't get the reward.)
detail.flavorText: 'Filch knew the secret passageways of the school better than anyone... and could pop up as suddenly as any of the ghosts.'

detail.name: Crabbe and Goyle
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard 2 cards from your hand to do 3 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: 'Both of them were thickest and looked extremely mean.'

detail.name: Detention!
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Adventure cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 2 Adventure cards in his or her hand and discards them.
detail.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

detail.name: Dragon's Blood
detail.text: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 11 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
detail.flavorText: '... Professor Dumbledore is particularly famous for... the discovery of the twelve uses of dragon's blood...' — Chocolate Frog card

detail.name: Dumbledore's Watch
detail.text: If this card is in play before your turn, discard all cards (other than each player's starting Character) from play (including this card).

detail.name: End-of-Year Feast
detail.text: Put up to 4 Adventure cards from your discard pile into your hand.
detail.flavorText: '... the huge Slytherin serpent vanished and a towering Gryffindor lion took its place.'

detail.name: Fang
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. When you play this card, do 4 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: 'Like Hagrid, Fang was clearly not as fierce as he looked.'

detail.name: Finding the Platform
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Location cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent lets you search your deck. You may take up to 2 Location cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.reward: Your opponent may put a Lesson card from his or her hand into play.

detail.name: Galleon
detail.text: You can play only 1 Money card each turn. Before your turn, if this card is in play, discard it and your get 3 more Actions this turn.

detail.name: Great Hall
detail.text: Before each player's turn, he or she draws a card.
detail.flavorText: 'It was lit by thousands and thousands of candles which were floating in midair over four long tables, ...'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Hagrid's House
detail.text: Whenever a Care of Magical Creatures Lesson (yours or your opponent's) is discarded from play, put it into its owner's hand.
detail.flavorText: 'Hagrid lived in a small wooden house on the edge of the Forbidden Forest.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Harry Triumphant
detail.text: At the end of each of your turns, if you played an Adventure card that turn, draw up to 4 cards.
detail.flavorText: '... to Mr Harry Potter ...' ... '... for pure nerve and outstanding courage, I award Gryffindor house sixty points.' — Albus Dumbledore

detail.name: Hospital Dormitory
detail.text: Each turn, each player may prevent 4 damage done to him or her. (The damage may be prevented from one or more cards.)
detail.flavorText: 'He realised he must be in the hospital wing.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Hut on the Rock
detail.effect: Before each of your opponent's turns, if he or she has any cards in play (other than his or her starting Character), he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Madam Pomfrey
detail.text: Once per game, you may shuffle up to 12 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'Madam Pomfrey, the matron, was a nice woman, but very strict.'

detail.name: Meeting Fluffy
detail.effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 12 damage.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent lets you choose 3 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discard them.
detail.reward: Your opponent gets 1 more Action the turn he or she solves this Adventure.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 9 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Midnight Duel
detail.effect: To use an Action to play a Creature or a Spell card from his or her hand, your opponent must discard another card from his or her hand.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discards them.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Mirror of Erised
detail.text: You may use an Action to discard this card from play. If you do, count the number of cards in your hand and discard them. Then search your deck. You may take up to that number of cards from your deck and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Peeves
detail.text: Once per game, you may discard your hands and draw 7 cards to make your opponent discard his or her hand and then draw 7 cards.
detail.flavorText: '... Peeves the poltergeist was worth two locked doors and a trick staircase if you met him when you were late for class.'

detail.name: Philosopher's Stone
detail.text: You may use 2 Actions to discard this card from play to put all Lesson cards from your discard pile into play. Then shuffle all non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck. When you build your deck, you can only put 1 Philosopher's Stone in it.

detail.name: Potions Dungeon
detail.text: Whenever a Potions Lesson (yours or your opponent's) is discarded from play, put it into its owner's hand.
detail.flavorText: 'It... would have been quite creepy enough without the pickled animals floating in glass jars all around the walls.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Quidditch Cup
detail.text: Once during each of your turns, when you use an Action to play a card that needs Power, you get 1 more Action that turn.

detail.name: Quidditch Pitch
detail.text: Spell cards that need Quidditch Power (yours and your opponent's) need 2 less Power to play (you still need at least 1 Power that matches).
detail.flavorText: 'At either end of the pitch were three golden poles with hoops at the end.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Riding the Centaur
detail.effect: Prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Creatures.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and returns them to his or her hand.
detail.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

detail.name: Ron the Brave
detail.text: At the end of each of your turns, if you played an Adventure card that turn, your may search your deck. You may take a Character card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: '... you don't think we'd let you go alone?' - Ron Weasley

detail.name: Stoat Sandwiches
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Healing cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 5 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discards them.
detail.reward: Your opponent may shuffle up to 5 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

detail.name: The Fat Lady
detail.text: You may use an Action to search your deck. You may take a Gryffindor card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'At the very end of the corridor hung a portrait of a very fat woman in a pink silk dress. 'Password?', she said.'

detail.name: Voldemort Revealed
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Spell cards.
detail.reward: Your opponent may put up to 2 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile and put them on the bottom of his deck (in any order).

detail.name: Welsh Green Dragon
detail.text: To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. When you play this card, do 6 damage to your opponent.
detail.flavorText: '... you can't tame dragons, it's dangerous.' - Ron Weasley

detail.name: 5 Points from Gryffindor
detail.effect: Your opponent gets 1 fewer Action on each of his or her turns (even the turn this Adventure is solved). (If this would mean your opponent would have fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets 1 Action.)
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 5 cards from his or her hand and discards them.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Alohomora
detail.text: Search your deck. You may take a Location of Adventure card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: 'She grabbed Harry's wand, tapped the lock and whispered, 'Alohomora!''

detail.name: Baneberry Potion
detail.text: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 8 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

detail.name: Bludger Bop
detail.text: Your opponent chooses 1 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discards it. Then, if he or she has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.
detail.flavorText: '... OUCH - that must have hurt, hit in the back of the head by a Bludger  - ...'  - Lee Jordan, commentator

detail.name: Candy Cart
detail.effect: Before each of your opponent's turns, he or she draws 3 cards and then chooses 3 cards in his or her hand and discards them.
detail.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 3 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Collapsible Cauldron
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. If this card is discarded from play, put it into your hand.

detail.name: Flying Motorbike
detail.text: Choose an Adventure or Location in play and discard it. (If you discard an Adventure, you don't get the reward.)
detail.flavorText: '... with a roar it rose into the air and off into the night.'

detail.name: Flying Practice
detail.effect: Spell cards that need Quidditch Power use up 2 of your opponent's Actions instead of 1.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent discards 4 cards that need Quidditch Power from his or her hand.

detail.name: Forbidden Corridor
detail.text: Before each player's turn, he or she chooses 1 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and discards it. At the end of each player's turn, if he or she has no Lessons in play, discard this card.
detail.flavorText: 'And now they know why it was forbidden.'
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).

detail.name: Looking for Trevor
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Creature cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 2 of his or her Lessons in play and discards them.
detail.reward: Your opponent may search his or her deck. He or she may take a Creature card, show it to you, and put it into his or her hand. Then your opponent shuffles his or her deck.

detail.name: Marble Gargoyle
detail.text: When Marble Gargoyle does damage to your opponent, if he or she doesn't have any Creatures in play, it does 3 more damage to him or her.
detail.flavorText: 'Gulpin' gargoyles ...' - Rubeus Hagrid

detail.name: Muddy Practice
detail.toSolve: Discard 5 cards from your hand in this way.
detail.reward: The winner does 10 damage to his or her opponent.
detail.note: Either player may use an Action to discard a card from his or her hand.

detail.name: Purple Firecrackers
detail.text: Your opponent chooses 3 cards in his or her hand and discards them. (If he or she has fewer than 3 cards in his or her hand, he or she discards all of them.)
detail.flavorText: 'It took several purple firecrackers exploding from the end of Professor Dumbledore's wand to bring silence.'

detail.name: Running from Filch
detail.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Lesson cards.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 6 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Sickle
detail.text: You can play only 1 Money card each turn. Before your turn, if this card is in play, discard it and your get 2 more Actions this turn.

detail.name: Star Grass Salve
detail.text: To play this card, discard one of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 12 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

detail.name: Through the Trapdoor
detail.effect: Your opponent discards the card drawn at the start of each of his or her turns.
detail.toSolve: The card drawn and discarded at the start of your opponent's turn is a Lesson card.

detail.name: Winter Holiday
detail.text: Your opponent chooses 3 of his or her Lessons in play and discards them. Then you choose 3 of your Lessons in play and discard them. (If either of you has fewer than 3 Lessons in play, that player discards them all.)
detail.flavorText: '... Hogwarts woke to find itself covered in several feet of snow.'

detail.name: Vacances d'hiver
detail.text: Votre adversaire choisit 3 de ses Cours en jeu et s'en défausse. Vous choisissez ensuite 3 de vos Cours en jeu et vous vous en défaussez. (Si l'un de vous a moins de 3 Cours en jeu, il se défausse de tous ses Cours.)
detail.flavorText: 'Poudlard se réveilla sous enu épaisse couche de neige.'

detail.name: Wooden Flute
detail.text: Choose up to 3 Creatures in play and return them to their owner's hands.
detail.flavorText: '... it sounded a bit like an owl.'

detail.name: Anti-Cheating Spell
detail.text: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Lessons there, choose 1 of them and discard it.
detail.flavorText: 'They had been given special, new quills for the exams, which had been bewitched with an Anti-Cheating spell.'

detail.name: Bewitched Snowballs
detail.text: Do 3 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then draw a card.
detail.flavorText: '... the Weasley twins were punished for bewitching several snowballs so that they followed Quirrell around, bouncing off the back of his turban.'

detail.name: Black Bat
detail.text: When you play this card, do 2 damage to your opponent.

detail.name: Bucking Broomstick
detail.text: Do 3 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 2 of them and discards them (1 if he or she only has 1).
detail.flavorText: 'It was as though the broom was trying to buck him off.'

detail.name: Cauldron Cakes
detail.text: Choose up to 2 non-Healing cards from your discard pile and put them on the bottom of your deck (in any order). Then draw a card. (Cauldron Cakes isn't really a Cauldron.)
detail.flavorText: 'He had never had any money for sweets with the Dursleys ...'

detail.name: Charms Accident
detail.text: Do 2 damage to your opponent. You may also choose a non-Healing Item in play and return it to its owner's hand.
detail.flavorText: 'Seamus got so impatient that he prodded it with his wand and set fire to it - ...'

detail.name: Dog Bite
detail.text: Choose a Creature in play. That Creature does damage to your opponent equal to that Creature's printed 'Damage each turn.'
detail.flavorText: ''Blasted thing,' Snape was saying. 'How are you supposed to keep your eyes on all three heads at once?''

detail.name: Every-Flavour Beans
detail.text: Reveal the top 2 card of your deck. Put into play any Lesson cards you revealed. Put into your discard pile any non-Lesson cards you revealed. Then draw a card.
detail.flavorText: 'When they say every flavour, they mean every flavour - ...'  - Ron Weasley

detail.name: Fire Protection Potion
detail.text: Do 3 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by Spell cards.
detail.flavorText: 'He ... saw the black flames licking his body but couldn't feel them - ...'

detail.name: Fungiface Potion
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 6 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

detail.name: Knut
detail.text: You can play only 1 Money card each turn. Before your turn, if this card is in play, discard it and you get 1 more Action this turn.

detail.name: Liquorice Wand
detail.text: Do 2 damage to your opponent. Then draw a card. (Liquorice Wand isn't really a Wand.)

detail.name: Loop-the-Loops
detail.text: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then draw 4 cards.
detail.flavorText: 'When Angelina had scored, Harry had done a couple loop-the-loops to let out his feelings.'

detail.name: Manegro Potion
detail.text: Count the number of Potions Lessons you have in play. Do that much damage to your opponent. Then choose 1 of your Potions Lessons in play and discard it.

detail.name: Muffling Draught
detail.text: During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Spell cards.

detail.name: Owl Post
detail.text: Draw 3 cards.
detail.flavorText: '... about a hundred owls had suddenly streamed into the Great Hall ...'

detail.name: Photo Album
detail.text: Before each of your turns, draw a card.
detail.flavorText: 'Smiling and waving at him from every page were his mother and father.'

detail.name: Sandstone Gargoyle
detail.text: When Sandstone Gargoyle does damage to your opponent, if he or she doesn't have any Creatures in play, it does 2 more damage to him or her.
detail.flavorText: 'It was sitting as still as a statue...'

detail.name: School Broom
detail.text: When you play this card, draw a card. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

detail.name: Scribblifors
detail.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character). Your opponent discards one of them and returns the other to his or her hand.

detail.name: Sleeping Potion
detail.text: Do 4 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Adventure cards.

detail.name: Switching Spell
detail.text: Choose an Item in play (yours or your opponent's) and discard it. Then search your deck. You may take an Item card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.flavorText: '... you'll lose all the points I got from Professor McGonagall for knowing about Switching Spells.' - Hermione Granger

detail.name: Troll Bogies
detail.text: Choose a non-Healing Item in play and return it to its owner's hand.
detail.flavorText: 'He bent down and pulled his wand out of the troll's nose. It was covered in what looked like lumpy grey glue. 'Urgh - troll bogies.''

detail.name: Vanishing Step
detail.text: During your opponent's next turn, he or she gets 1 fewer Action. (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets 1 Action.)
detail.flavorText: 'There were ... some with a vanishing step halfway up that you had to remember to jump.'

detail.name: Care of Magical Creatures
detail.text: Provides 1 Care of Magical Creatures lesson.

detail.name: Charms
detail.text: Provides 1 Charms lesson.

detail.name: Potions
detail.text: Provides 1 Potions lesson.

detail.name: Quidditch
detail.text: Provides 1 Quidditch lesson.

detail.name: Transfiguration
detail.text: Provides 1 Transfiguration lesson.
